title: The Autonomous SDR
hookLine: Build a sales rep that never sleeps, never complains, and sends 1,000 hyper-personalized emails a day.

process: Scrape recent company news and funding events
Feed data to LLM to generate a customized icebreaker
Inject prospect and copy into an active cold email sequence
output: Booked Calendly meetings directly in your calendar
proof: Took a pipeline from 0 to 15 meetings booked in 7 days on autopilot.

title: Voice-Activated Closer
hookLine: Connect a voice agent to your CRM and have it call every inbound lead within 5 seconds.

process: Trigger webhook the millisecond a lead form is submitted
Voice AI dials the provided phone number immediately
AI conducts a natural pre-qualification interview based on a script
If qualified, pushes a live transfer to a human closer
output: Hot transferred calls or automatically booked appointments
proof: Increased connection and qualification rate by 400% vs human calling after 10 mins.

title: Zero-Click Content Engine
hookLine: Turn one podcast transcript into a month of SEO blogs and LinkedIn posts without touching a keyboard.

process: Transcribe audio with speaker mapping
Pass transcript to Claude to extract core frameworks and controversial takes
Generate 4 long-form blogs and 15 short social posts via chained prompts
Format and save deliverables directly into a Notion database
output: A fully populated, multi-channel content calendar ready for review
proof: Saved 20 hours a week on content production while 2x-ing organic traffic.

title: Faceless Video Factory
hookLine: Script, voice, and generate talking-head videos entirely via API. No camera required.

process: LLM writes a highly-engaging, controversial hook and script
Voice clone generates an emotional audio track
AI Avatar generator syncs photorealistic lip movements to the audio
Auto-publish via API to YouTube Shorts and TikTok
output: Rendered MP4 video live on social platforms
proof: Hit 1M+ views in 30 days across networks without ever recording actual footage.

title: The Infinite Landing Page
hookLine: Dynamically generate a unique, hyper-targeted landing page for every single ad click.

process: Capture inbound UTM parameters and search intent
LLM instantly rewrites the page headline and subcopy to match the exact query
Inject customized Stripe checkout link reflecting dynamic pricing
Deploy static page adjustments before the user realizes it happened
output: A personalized URL with a 1-to-1 message match for the buyer
proof: Boosted paid ad conversion rates from 2% to 11% by matching exact search intent.

title: AI-Powered Research Agency
hookLine: Sell $5,000 market research reports that cost you $5 in API credits and 10 minutes to generate.

process: Search agent scrapes the top 50 competitors in the space
LLM synthesizes pricing models, core features, and negative reviews
Formats data into a premium, styled PDF layout via document API
Automatically emails final deliverable to the client
proof: Delivered 5 reports in one weekend, grossing $25k with zero employees or contractors.

title: Local Business Lead Machine
hookLine: Find businesses with terrible reviews and auto-pitch them a reputation management solution.

process: Scrape Google Maps for businesses with < 3-star ratings
Extract owner contact info and email addresses
Generate customized cold email featuring a screenshot of their worst review
Trigger AI voice mail drop offering an immediate fix
output: Inbound, agitated replies from desperate business owners
proof: Secured 3 local marketing retainers in 48 hours using purely programmatic outreach.

title: Auto-Newsletter Monetization
hookLine: A newsletter that writes itself, finds its own sponsors, and handles its own billing.

inputs: RSS feeds of top 10 niche blogs
process: Aggregate weekly news and trending topics
LLM summarizes data and adds contrarian, engaging takes
Query sponsor database for relevant matches based on the content
Auto-insert sponsor tracking link and deploy broadcast via ESP
output: A highly-curated weekly dispatch sent to thousands of readers
proof: Hit $1k/mo in passive sponsorships in 60 days with a 0-hour weekly operating time.
